amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.para: In addition to the requirements of 20 U.S.C. 1094(a)(23), the University of Nebraska, each state college, and each community college shall provide information furnished by the Secretary of State on early voting prior to each statewide primary and general election to each student enrolled in a degree or certificate program and physically in attendance at the institution. The information shall include instructions on early voting and an application to request a ballot for early voting. The institution may provide the information electronically.
